record.creatorPhotographer: Chicago Daily News; Wide World Photo
record.description: Co-eds at the University of Chicago test new flu vaccine. Five hundred students at the University of Chicago received a new type of influenza vaccine to test its efficacy. Nurse Martha Cooley inoculates Freshman Jean Roff. The vaccine was discovered this autumn by two researchers at the Rockefeller Foundation in New York.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
